amendment.description: To require an annual report on the use of United States funds with respect to the activities and management of the International Committee of the Red Cross.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1313 withdrawn in Senate.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

Amendment SA 1313 proposed by Senator Inhofe. (consideration: CR S8611-8613; text: CR S8611) To require an annual report on the use of United States funds with respect to the activities and management of the International Committee of the Red Cross.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1313 proposed by Senator Inhofe.
